Question: Jeollanam-do CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jeollanam-do CES 2024

BK Energy Co., Ltd.

- Floating rotation solar power system
- Improved energy efficiency
- Reduced failure rate

Nuri Flex Co., Ltd.

- Household energy usage measurement solutions
- Remote data processing and management
- Expansion into global markets

Low Carbon Co., Ltd.

- Blue hydrogen production using CCUS technology
- Carbon capture from the atmosphere
- Distributed DAC facilities for carbon capture

Human IT Solutions Co., Ltd.

- Personalized exercise programs using XR technology
- Standardized health information metadata
- 3D virtual space configuration for exercising

PARU Printed Electronics

- Eco-friendly, high-efficiency energy components for printed electronics
- Conductive ink manufacturing technology
- Roll-to-roll printing technology

TDL Co., Ltd.

- All-solid-state battery manufacturing
- Entire process from materials to component modules
- Registered solid electrolyte and all-solid-state battery in Korea

SCI Korea Co., Ltd.

- EDL Doctor AI non-invasive blood glucose meter
- Biometric information for blood sugar and blood pressure measurement
- Health management tips through mobile app

IT Convergence Co., Ltd.

- Artificial intelligence-based crop image recognition and measurement
- Automatic crop growth measurement device for smart farms
- Data analysis for crop growth and environmental data

IoT Plus Korea Co., Ltd.

- Microgrid power control technology for renewable energy
- V2L-linked hybrid inverter for emergency power
- Remote monitoring and control functions

Aisol Co., Ltd.

- Online and offline blended classes software
- Real-time two-way communication between teachers and students
- Increased student participation and concentration

Kalsun Co., Ltd.

- Building-integrated solar power generation system
- BIPV module as building material for exterior walls
- RoHS certified BIPV industry leader
